definitions.definition: a series of vertebrae extending from the skull to the small of the back, enclosing the spinal cord and providing support for the thorax and abdomen; the backbone.
examples: backbone, spinal column, vertebral column; Moreback; technicalrachis "he injured his spine"Moreback; rachis he injured his spine

definitions.definition: a thing's central feature or main source of strength.
examples: players who will form the spine of our team

definitions.definition: the part of a book's jacket or cover that encloses the inner edges of the pages, facing outward when the book is on a shelf and typically bearing the title and the author's name.
any hard pointed defensive projection or structure, such as a prickle of a hedgehog, a spikelike projection on a sea urchin, a sharp ray in a fish's fin, or a spike on the stem of a plant.
examples: needle, quill, bristle, barb, spike, prickle; Morethorn; technicalspicule "the spines of a porcupine"Morethorn; spicule the spines of a porcupine

definitions.definition: a tall mass of viscous lava extruded from a volcano.
